name: L-glutamate:ferredoxin oxidoreductase (deaminating)
definition: L-Glutamate + 2 Oxidized ferredoxin + H2O <=> Ammonia + 2-Oxoglutarate + 2 Reduced ferredoxin + 2 H+
comment: second step of two-step reaction (see R00021, R00256+R10086)
